title: Belinda Goes to Bath
description: On the London Quicksilver 1800s stagecoach to "The Bath", Miss Hannah Pym 45 finds Miss Belinda Earle banished for running off with a footman, so her fond-of-drink chaperone Miss Wimple gossips. Coach overturned in a river, passengers rescued to nearby Baddell Castle by dashing Marquess of Frenton to divert snobs Lord and Jordan, greedy for Penelope.
author: Marion Chesney
